text: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِيَ فِي ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصۡرٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمۡۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِي صُدُورِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one [of them] is harmed for [the cause of] Allah, they consider the trial of the people as [if it were] the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures
translation.id: Dan di antara manusia ada sebagian yang berkata, "Kami beriman kepada Allah," tetapi apabila dia disakiti (karena dia beriman) kepada Allah, dia menganggap cobaan manusia itu sebagai siksaan Allah.618) Dan jika datang pertolongan dari Tuhanmu, niscaya mereka akan berkata, "Sesungguhnya kami bersama kamu." Bukankah Allah lebih mengetahui apa yang ada di dalam dada semua manusia
